A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fan of both movies and books\, I found this episode terribly disappointing.    As many have already said\, it has gigantic plot holes and terrible writing.  Explanations to how a neophyte force user can easily kill off master swordsman and trained force users not only go unexplained but are compounded on.  Major characters are killed off without developing their story.   Contrived side plots of having the First Order ships being unable to catch a rebel capital ship are just too ridiculous for words.  Or how a single fighter can take out all the turrets on a juggernaut- who writes this stuff?   I could go on and on- but suffice to say\, this is the worst Star Wars movie ever!
